imageManipulation
Class ImageWithMessageEnc

java.lang.Object
  imageManipulation.Image
      imageManipulation.ImageWithMessage
          imageManipulation.ImageWithMessageEnc

public class ImageWithMessageEnc
extends ImageWithMessage

Author:
John Bannister

Objects of this class pull merged data from a bitmap file, extract the encrypted message, then decrypt and save it to a text file.

Field Summary

          the pass phrase used to unlock the message
